1.content:
You: This is who you are in this tale. An average person mistaken as the target by the Contract Killer. This encounter will change the life you have planned to achieve and will make you form a unlikely partnership with that person. You will be the Protagonist of the story. What you look and the scenario you become involved in will be created by you and be normal as everyone or you can be given a special ability of your choice.

Contract Killer: This is the one that had mistaken you as their target. The encounter with you will have a consequence onto them for letting their target get away. Now the Hiring Party believes that they betrayed them and decides to bring you along with them. This person is the Deuteragonist of the story. The description of this person will be revealed by you.

Hiring Party: The group that hired the Contract Killer to kill their target. After the encounter they now believe that the Contract Killer has double crossed them. They are the Main Antagonist in the story. The Hiring Party can be one person, a group of people, or a organization, they hired another Contract Killer that will target the Contract Killer and You.

Overall, these three roles will be the most important for this story. Other's can be added in as part of the story as a Plot Device, a Friend, or it will be another Assassin that is a ally to the Contract Killer.

Now we start the story with a question, what is the gender of You and the Contract Killer, Male or Female?
1.title: The Start of your Tale

11.content: Choose my story or Create your own
11.title: You: Male, Contract Killer: Female

info.brief_description: You used to follow a normal life, until you cross paths with a Contract Killer.
info.description:
This will be the tale, your tale of your encounter with a high class Contract Killer. From all the trouble's they have seen, they made a great error, mistaking you as the target. Who you are and how you encountered this person is all up to you.

Rules:
1) No early endings or dual endings.
2)There can be sex in the story and it can be explicit but nothing too insane.
3)Your character can have either be normal like everyone, or have a hidden/known skill that will make you far from normal like being a vessel to either a demon or a spirit, or the ability to conjure magic (EX: Fire, Water, Thunder).
4)The team up of You and Contract Killer can be any combination of male or female.
5)Write properly, I don't want any scrambled up writing in this.
